attributes.action: Implement a fixed price for away football tickets in the Premier League
attributes.additional_details:
Currently football tickets raise in price season on season well above the rate of inflation. Fans young and old have been priced out of the game they love and the game they have given so much to.

We propose a fixed price of £25 for away games for all those away fans who travel the length of the country each week.

rejection.details: For the Football Association to decide upon
